definitions.definition: To make a vibrating sound in its throat when contented or in certain other conditions.
To say (something) in a throaty , seductive manner.
To make a vibrating throaty sound, as from pleasure .
examples: He purred like a kitten when she massaged his neck.

definitions.definition: To spend time enjoying and expressing pleasure (over something); to coo ; to enthuse .
To make a low and consistent rumbling sound.

main_definition: ( intransitive , of a cat ) To make a vibrating sound in its throat when contented or in certain other conditions.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To say (something) in a throaty , seductive manner.
( intransitive ) To make a vibrating throaty sound, as from pleasure .
( intransitive with over ) To spend time enjoying and expressing pleasure (over something); to coo ; to enthuse .
( intransitive , of an engine ) To make a low and consistent rumbling sound.
